column1: 14-1  Main Indicators of Industrial Enterprises above Designated Size (2011)
Enterprises with Funds from Hong Kong,
Other Enterprises with Funds from Hong
a) Industrial enterprises above designated size are all state-owned enterprises and non-state owned enterprises with annual revenue from principal
business over 5 million yuan from 1998 to 2006, and are industrial enterprise with annual revenue from principal business over 5 million yuan, and
are industrial enterprise with annual revenue from prinicpal business over 20 million yuan. The same applies to the tables following.
